ygData.subject: Re: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: Out of curiousity, what is your problem with twinking? How does twinking degrade your play and or fun? How does it prevent you from doing leveling, completing
ygData.messageBody:
Out of curiousity, what is your problem with twinking? How does twinking
degrade your play and or fun? How does it prevent you from doing
leveling, completing quests, goofing off? If the gear was on a level 50
PC, how is this better than a level 1 PC?

Just curious, cause personally, I think telling people what they can and
cannot do with items they own is silly in the first place, and I've
never noticed any lessening of my enjoyment of the game due to some
twinking. Well, I've thought to myself "Garsh, it'd sure be nice if *I*
had that..."

Mark

Lemac Justerian wrote:
>
> From: "Lemac Justerian" <lemac@...>
>
> Joint bank accounts wouldn't be that great of an idea... For the reasons you
> stated, it would, but it would be abused too easily to help *twink* another
> character up...
>
